ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
2 ounces canned diced jalapeno peppers, drained

cookingTips: Ensure cream cheese is fully softened for smooth blending with mayonnaise
Drain canned peppers thoroughly to avoid excess liquid diluting the spread
Mix thoroughly until all ingredients are evenly distributed for consistent flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you blend this spread until completely smooth or leave it slightly chunky for texture?
